item.title: Use item on object
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

im trying to make it so u fish at same fountain no matter what, but u get different manta ammount dependant on level, also, is 618 the correct animation for harpoon fishing? thanks[br][size=1]Posted on: April 07, 2007, 10:49:00 PM[/size][hr]also…can u give me step by step? or a code to put in and where to put it please?..im not 100% stupid but i’m not a java expert either[br][size=1]Posted on: April 07, 2007, 10:49:46 PM[/size][hr]i need help cmon

item.title: Use item on object
item.dc:creator: @LeScape_Pk LeScape Pk
item.description:
@LeScape_Pk wrote:

how do i make it so when i use a harpoon on fountain 879, that it initiates the following case

case 10091: { if (playerLevel[10] <= 40) { addSkillXP((20*playerLevel[10]), 10); addItem(389, 1); startAnimation(618); sendMessage("You See A Manta Ray In The Fountain...Steady...Got It!"); } else if (playerLevel[10] <= 60) { addSkillXP((35*playerLevel[10]), 10); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); startAnimation(618); sendMessage("You Scoop Your Hand Into The Fountain And Pull Out Three Manta Ray"); } else if (playerLevel[10] <= 80) { addSkillXP((55*playerLevel[10]), 10); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); startAnimation(618); sendMessage("You Lunge Your Hand Into The Pool And Pull Out Five Manta Rays By The Tail"); } else if (playerLevel[10] <= 90) { addSkillXP((70*playerLevel[10]), 10); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); startAnimation(618); sendMessage("You Pull Out Nine Manta Rays From The Pool"); } else if (playerLevel[10] >= 99) { addSkillXP((150*playerLevel[10]), 10); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); addItem(389, 1); startAnimation(618); sendMessage("You Grab Ray After Ray Out Of The Pool Until You Have Twenty-Eight"); } } break;
also, is the ^^^above code^^^ correct? if not how do i fix it, thanks
